name: Quick Test Circuit
description: Short 3-exercise circuit for testing the app flow.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.voiceCueMid: Keep those arms and legs moving!
exercises.formTips: Land softly on the balls of your feet. Full arm and leg extension.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.voiceCueStart: Wall sit. Slide down until thighs are parallel to the floor.
exercises.formTips: Back flat against the wall. Knees directly over ankles.

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.formTips: Keep body straight. Lower chest close to the floor.
